plot outline: Two do-no-gooders stumble upon an 'ancient box' which contains a genie imprisoned by who else, a magician. At the same time, the 'descendant' of the magician is after this lost box along with a gang of international-to-next-street-crooks. The police inspector charged with finding this box is also pursuing a local don.
title: Nage Bomb
